name: Selfish Santa Claus: The Cancelled Christmas
name_original: Selfish Santa Claus: The Cancelled Christmas
description:
CHRISTMAS TIME!

In this Christmas, Santa has decided to cancel Christmas and keep all gifts for himself. Now, Santa sold all toys to get new cars.

Santa will go in the city to show off and pick more money to buy new cars. But beware of crashing and traffics. If you collect enough coins then you can unlock 5 cool vehicles.

DOWNLOAD SELFISH SANTA CLAUS for FREE now!

Send us your most welcome comments!
You can leave them at: support@meilleursjeuxmobiles.com
